<h2 class="pdoc-module-header" id="UserAssignedIdentity">
<a class="pdoc-member-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure/blob/5cb7c30ae0d736e81ca429641e551ad6faeba99a/sdk/nodejs/msi/userAssignedIdentity.ts#L27">class <b>UserAssignedIdentity</b></a>
</h2>
<div class="pdoc-module-contents" markdown="1">
<pre class="highlight"><span class='kd'>extends</span> <a href='https://pulumi.io/reference/pkg/nodejs/@pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResource'>CustomResource</a></pre>

Manages a user assigned identity.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as azure from "@pulumi/azure";

const test = new azure.core.ResourceGroup("test", {
    location: "eastus",
    name: "acceptanceTestResourceGroup1",
});
const testIdentity = new azure.msi.UserAssignedIdentity("testIdentity", {
    location: test.location,
    name: "search-api",
    resourceGroupName: test.name,
});
```
